title: Hit-and-run crash kills cyclist in Fall River, DA says
author: Audrey Cooney
bullets: Local News The driver of a green Subaru Legacy fled the scene after fatally injuring a cyclist in Fall River, the Bristol County District Attorney said.
A 34-year-old man was killed in a hit-and-run crash in Fall River on Sunday, the local prosecutor said.
Fall River police received a call for a bicyclist who had been hit by a vehicle just after 5 p.

title: Video: Bruins’ Nikita Zadorov dresses as Santa Claus ahead of holiday game vs. Montreal

bullets: Boston Bruins Zadorov was one of several Bruins to don some festive attire ahead of Tuesday's game against the Habs.
Nikita Zadorov was in a festive mood ahead of Tuesday's game against Montreal.

title: Healey opposes proposed rent control ballot question
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Politics A proposal to enact statewide rent control could be in front of voters next year.
Gov.
Maura Healey is concerned that this could slow housing production.

title: Boston health officials issue warning amid 114% spike in flu cases
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Health The city’s flu surge is happening about a month earlier this year, health officials said.

Joe Raedle / Getty Images, File By Abby Patkin December 23, 2025 | 3:41 PM 1 minute to read Boston public health officials are warning of an earlier flu surge this season, reporting a dramatic 114% spike in cases just days before Christmas.

Flu-related trips to the emergency room have also increased 44% in recent days, and the rate of infection is increasing most rapidly among children, the Boston Public Health Commission said in a press release Tuesday.

title: Video: Former R.I. mayoral candidate taunts police during drunk driving arrest
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime “I told my kids if they ever became a cop, I’d kill ’em,” Maria Bucci allegedly told the officer who arrested her.
“Only clowns become a cop.
” Maria Bucci, a former candidate for mayor of Cranston, Rhode Island, was arrested in East Greenwich last week on suspicion of drunk driving.
